definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_xp"><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="153">Gives the player XP based on how many items where smelted.</comment><value name="xpamount"><block type="block_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">xpAmount</field><comment pinned="false" h="53" w="155">Variable name for the stored XP Amount.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_num_set"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Resets the XP amount variable back to 0 ready for the next use.</comment><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">xpAmount</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
